channel.title: Setting up new sites or foums! (im helping!)
channel.description:
Hello,
My name is xdeathxmagex and I am offering to make forums or sites for people. The sites are through nationvoice and the forums are SMF. The format for a request is as follows:
Site: [b]Server Name: Description of server: Updates you have done to server: Server source: Admin Name: Forums addon Y/N:[/b]
Forums: [b]Server Name: Sever Description: Admin Name: Fav color (for skin): Arcade Y/N: Gallery Y/N: Links system Y/N:[/b]
[b][i][u]I WILL PM THE ADMINS PASS TO YOU!!![/u][/i][/b]
Sites I've made:::: I made 3 but i dont have url.
Forums I've made:::: [url=http://pkpwnage.smfforfree2.com]PKpwnage[/url] [url=http://z0mgs.smfforfree2.com]z0mgs[/url] [url=http://robinhoodfantasy2.smfforfree2.com]Robin Hood Fantasy[/url] [url=http://freijascape.smfforfree2.com]Freijascape---mine![/url]
THOSE ARE SOME EXAMPLES!!
~~xdeathxmagex~~
